meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Colleen Simon Phil Gibbons Jim Tompkins-MacLaine Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1065.

td.p: Colleen Simon, a real estate broker from Villa Park, California
Phil Gibbons, a salesman from Hermosa Beach, California
Jim Tompkins-MacLaine, a musician originally from Tiffin, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,000)

tr.td: 4-LETTER WORDS
THE HEART
WEAPONS
POP MUSIC
FOOD FACTS
NAME THAT TOON
(Alex: No, that's not a new television game show -- the reference is to cartoons.)
